meanings.definition: A person who has an excessive interest in or admiration of themselves.
meanings.sent1: The narcissists in the room couldn't stop talking about themselves.
meanings.sent2: She always thought she was the best, a true narcissist.
meanings.sent3: The narcissists at the party kept taking selfies non-stop.
meanings.sent4: His reflection in the mirror seemed to be the only friend of the narcissists.
meanings.sent5: The narcissists in the movie were so obsessed with their looks.
